# <code>from toml</code> for formats

<div class='command-title'>Parse text as .toml and create table.</div>

## Signature

```> from toml```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Converts toml formatted string to table
```shell
  > 'a = 1' | from toml
```
  Converts toml formatted string to table
```shell
  > 'a = 1
```b = [1, 2]' | from toml
